name: Weeping Treant
description: The Weeping Treant is a large plant creature with thick, dark sap streaming continuously down its face and trunk, giving it a somber appearance.
memorable: Its ability to ooze acidic sap creates dangerous situations for melee attackers, while it can also communicate with plants.
goals: To protect its forest and engage in strategic combat as a frontline defender.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other plant creatures or in forest environments.
environment: Typically found in forests or overgrown areas.
strengths: High hit points and solid armor class make it resistant to damage; can deal significant bludgeoning and acid damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage and has low Dexterity, leading to less agility in combat.
attacks: The Weeping Treant can make powerful slam attacks that deal bludgeoning damage along with acidic damage, or it can throw rocks from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: Weep Acid: Causes continuous acid damage to creatures in close proximity.
senses: Has darkvision out to 60 feet and a passive Perception score of 13.
skills: Has a proficiency in Insight with a +6 bonus.
additional_information: Deals double damage to objects and structures as a Siege Monster.
Can converse with plants through the Speak with Plants ability.
Acidic tears create hazards for attackers.
Can perform multiattacks with both melee and ranged options.
Melee attacks inflict lingering acid damage over time.
test_queries: huge plant creature with acidic tears
defensive monster with high hit points
vine-covered monster that deals acid damage
